                            <div class="ipc-html-content-inner-div">
                                April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight

                        <span class="sc-53c98e73-7 hwuwjU">Director</span>
                        <span class="sc-53c98e73-6 fXEUnK"><a id="nm0005222" class="ipc-link ipc-link--base dli-director-item" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-disabled="false" href="/name/nm0005222/?ref_=chttp_pd_123">Sam Mendes</a></span>

                        <span class="sc-53c98e73-6 fXEUnK">
                            <a id="nm2835616" class="ipc-link ipc-link--base dli-cast-item" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-disabled="false" href="/name/nm2835616/?ref_=chttp_pca_1_123">Dean-Charles Chapman</a>
                        </span>
                        <span class="sc-53c98e73-6 fXEUnK">

                            <div class="ipc-html-content-inner-div">
                                After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the
